column9: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column28: Conferences of Speakers of European Parliamentary Assemblies (June 1977) and of European Union Parliaments (September 2000
column29: March 2001). Geographical area covered: European Union countries and European Union candidate and pre-candidate countries.
column30: This appropriation aims at financing the cooperation between the European Parliament and national parliaments in the parliamentary scrutiny of the CFSP/CSDP
column31: in accordance with the Treaty on European Union and the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union
column32: and in particular Articles 9 and 10 of Protocol No 1 on the role of national parliaments in the European Union.
column35: This appropriation is intended to cover:
column36: expenditure committed for promoting relations between the European Parliament and national parliaments. It relates to parliamentary relations other than those covered by Chapters 1 0 and 3 0
column38: and assistance in the analysis and management of that information
column39: including exchanges with the European Centre for Parliamentary Research and Documentation (ECPRD)
column42: including those linked to legislative work
column44: analysis and information and making the www.ipex.eu domain secure
column45: including those carried out by the ECPRD.
column47: Training schemes include study visits to the European Parliament in Brussels
column48: Luxembourg and Strasbourg; the appropriation is intended to cover all or part of the expenditure incurred by participants
